page.title: 14The Health Centre.
page.content: The Health Centre in Ash has 7 doctors and 5 health visitors. There is a dentist in one of the clinics catering for children and expectant mothers. The other clinics are used for chiropody, speech, well woman, immunisation, family planning, and a psychiatrist. They have 25,000 patients. Other surgeries cover Aldershot, Frimley Green,Camberley, Tongham,Ash Green,Christmas Pie, up to the Hogs Back. There are two midwives at the Centre. It is open every day except Sunday.It has won two awards, coming in second place for the best designed health care building and having the best facilities.
